item.title: 铁矿石反弹至 100 美元上方，因猜测需求可能回升
item.description: 铁矿石上涨，期货价格回升至每吨 100 美元以上，原因是市场猜测最大的钢铁生产国中国的需求可能回升。【原文：Iron ore rose — with futures pushing back above $100 a ton — on speculation that demand may pick up in China, the largest steelmaker.】

item.title: 溢价飙升后中国基金公司叫停黄金挂钩 ETF
item.description: 中国一家大型基金管理公司暂停了追踪黄金相关股票的交易所交易基金的交易，这是该产品溢价飙升后不到一周内的第二次暂停交易。【原文：A major Chinese money manager suspended trading in an exchange-traded fund tracking gold-related stocks, the second such move in less than a week after a surge in the product’s premium.】

item.title: 高盛称特朗普对华新关税计划将减缓美国经济增长
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：A steep increase in US tariffs on Chinese imports — which presidential candidate Donald Trump has vowed to impose if he’s elected — would hobble the domestic economy and push inflation up, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 汇丰银行 Quinn 目标提升中国和印度的财富管理水平
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的最高负责人表示，他正在努力提高公司在中国和印度的财富管理能力，使其与香港本土市场一样强大。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s top boss said he’s pushing to improve his firm’s wealth management capabilities in China and India so that they are just as strong as in its home market of Hong Kong.】

item.title: 美国数据强劲，降息预期减弱，黄金回调
item.description: 黄金在上周创下收盘纪录新高后下跌，原因是投资者权衡了一份强劲的美国就业报告，该报告使交易商解除了对美联储今年大幅降息的押注。【原文：Gold fell after closing at a record high last week, as investors weigh a strong US jobs report that saw traders unwinding bets for steep Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔总统赌墨西哥使馆突袭行动会给国内带来回报
item.description: 厄瓜多尔总统丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）违反国际规则，派遣警察袭击墨西哥大使馆，这是一场豪赌。到目前为止，他的行动取得了成功。【原文：Ecuador’s President Daniel Noboa took a big gamble when he violated international rules by sending police to storm the Mexican embassy. So far, it’s paying off for him.】

item.title: SK 海力士和航空航天交易后，韩国债券销售额飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 韩国公司今年出售本币公司债券的速度创下新高，因为投资者在预期的降息前锁定了收益率，而且政府在处理房地产行业紧张局势时赢得了一些信心。【原文：South Korean companies are selling local-currency corporate bonds at a record pace this year, as investors lock in yields before expected rate cuts and authorities win some confidence in their handling of property sector strains.】

item.title: 汇丰助力基金驾驭印度债券市场，包容性渐行渐近
item.description: 在印度加入全球债务指数之前，汇丰控股有限公司正与 200 多家海外基金合作，帮助它们在印度建立业务。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is engaging with over 200 overseas funds to help establish their presence in India ahead of the nation’s entry into global debt indexes.】

item.title: 人民币逼近 "红线"，中国坚守人民币防线
item.description: 在美元走强和市场情绪不佳的压力下，中国坚持维持人民币汇率，使其向政策红线靠拢。【原文：China stuck to a holding pattern of supporting the yuan as pressure from a resilient dollar and poor sentiment weakens it toward a policy red line.】

item.title: 澳大利亚最大养老基金称现在是购买私人资产的时候了
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金希望将更多资金投入私人市场投资，并将进一步增加海外资产投资。【原文：Australia’s largest pension fund wants to put more money into private-market investments and will further boost its exposure to overseas assets.】

item.title: 韩国流行音乐股票在经历 80 亿美元的下跌后有望进入新的增长阶段
item.description: 由于担心专辑销量下滑，K-pop 音乐经纪公司在 80 亿美元的股本缩水后，正需要第二次行动。【原文：K-pop music agencies are in need of a second act after an $8 billion equity rout sparked by concerns over falling album sales.】

item.title: 对日元的押注创 17 年来最高，152 的考验迫在眉睫
item.description: 投资者对日元下跌的押注是 17 年来最多的，而此时日元正徘徊在一个关键水平附近，这将增加日本采取干预措施的风险。【原文：Investors have piled on the most wagers for the yen to fall in 17 years, just as it teeters near a key level that would increase the risk of intervention from Japan.】

item.title: 里约集团任命资深人士巴塔担任商务总监，推动业务增长
item.description: 全球第二大矿业公司力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）将资深高管 Bold Baatar 调任为首席商务官，以寻求在包括铜在内的关键材料领域实现增长。【原文：Rio Tinto Group moved veteran executive Bold Baatar to become Chief Commercial Officer as the world’s second-largest miner seeks growth in key materials including copper.】

item.title: 中国国有银行请求法院对开发商世茂进行清算
item.description: 违约的中国开发商世茂集团控股有限公司正面临债权人中国建设银行（亚洲）股份有限公司（China Construction Bank (Asia) Corp.【原文：Defaulted Chinese developer Shimao Group Holdings Ltd. is facing a demand to liquidate from creditor China Construction Bank (Asia) Corp., one of the most prominent examples yet of a state-backed bank trying to claw back money from a distressed developer.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 耶伦结束为期四天的中国之行。石油价格向每桶 100 美元迈进。中国对澳大利亚的投资急剧下降。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：Yellen to wrap up four-day China trip. Oil heads for $100 a barrel. Chinese investment into Australia plummets. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 日本实际工资下降可能使日本央行暂时按兵不动
item.description: 日本工人的实际工资在 2 月份连续第 23 个月下降，此前消费者价格增长加速，拖累了支出，这一结果可能会使央行暂时按兵不动。【原文：Japanese workers’ real wages fell in February for a 23rd consecutive month after consumer price growth accelerated, exerting a drag on spending, in an outcome that will likely keep the central bank on hold for now.】

item.title: 以色列撤出部分加沙部队，石油反弹得以喘息
item.description: 在以色列表示将从加沙撤出部分军队后，石油在五个交易日中首次下滑，交易商也在等待本周的一系列市场报告，这些报告将为供需情况提供一个快照。【原文：Oil slipped for the first time in five sessions after Israel said it would pull some troops from Gaza, with traders also waiting for a series of market reports this week that will provide a snapshot on supply and demand.】

item.title: 亚洲股市蓄势待发，关注人民币每日定盘价：市场综述
item.description: 周五公布的就业数据显示美国经济强劲，亚洲股市将跟随华尔街走高。中国在两天假期后重新开放。【原文：Asian stocks are set to follow Wall Street higher after Friday’s jobs print indicated a strong US economy. China reopens after a two-day holiday.】

item.title: 大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）逼近好莱坞大奖：派拉蒙全球
item.description: 大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）是电影制片人、网球发烧友和科技财富的继承人，他即将再添一个头衔：媒体大亨。【原文：David Ellison, movie producer, tennis fanatic and heir to a technology fortune, is on the verge of adding another title: media mogul.】

item.title: Gildan 股东请求法院阻止董事会出售公司
item.description: Gildan Activewear Inc. 的最大股东之一要求魁北克法院阻止这家服装制造商的董事会出售公司。【原文：One of Gildan Activewear Inc.’s largest shareholders asked a Quebec court to block the clothing manufacturer’s board of directors from selling the company.】

item.title: 卢拉周日召集内阁会议讨论巴西国家石油公司问题
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）召集内阁部长召开紧急会议，讨论国有石油公司巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）的未来。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva has called an emergency meeting with ministers from his cabinet to discuss the future of state-controlled oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA.】

item.title: 央行决策在即，疲软泰铢或跌至 2023 年低点
item.description: 在央行降息压力日益增大的情况下，泰铢可能会延续近期跌势，测试去年低点的支撑位。【原文：The Thai baht may extend its recent declines to test support at last year’s low amid growing pressure on the central bank to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 印度如何摘取中国经济增长的桂冠
item.description:
如果印度的经济发展一切顺利，那么到 2028 年，印度将引领全球经济增长。【原文：

If India hits all the right economic notes it could lead global growth by 2028. 

】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 黄金不断飙升至历史新高，这让许多市场观察家感到困惑。原油反弹使一些交易商在原油价格飙升的情况下保护自己的成本增加，而这一市场已迅速成为一个非常看涨的市场。在农作物交易商等待美国农业部关于全球需求的重要报告时，美国农民正享受着多年来最好的冬小麦种植条件。【原文：Gold’s relentless surge to fresh record highs is proving to be a puzzle for many market observers. An oil rally is making it more costly for some traders to protect themselves from surging crude prices in what has quickly become a very bullish market. And as crop traders await insights from the US Department of Agriculture’s key report on global demand, American farmers are enjoying the best-post winter wheat conditions in years.】

item.title: 高盛和美国银行瞄准澳大利亚养老金对冲业务
item.description: 华尔街银行正在争夺澳大利亚养老基金的业务，因为这个世界上增长最快的退休储蓄池正在寻求对冲其庞大的海外投资。【原文：Wall Street banks are jostling for business from Australia’s pension funds as the world’s fastest-growing pool of retirement savings looks to hedge its chunky overseas investments.】

item.title: 焦点转向 CPI，债券交易员认为 4.5% 的收益率是下一个考验
item.description: 对于被今年的大跌烧伤的债券交易员来说，还有一个希望：一个迹象表明，美联储正在对抗通胀的斗争中占据上风。【原文：There’s one hope left for bond traders burned by this year’s selloff: a sign that the Federal Reserve is gaining the upper hand in its fight against inflation.】

item.title: 新西兰央行拒绝提前降息的赌注
item.description: 尽管新西兰经济已陷入二次衰退，但新西兰央行本周可能会回击投资者关于即将降息的押注。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank may this week push back against investor bets that interest-rate cuts are coming, even though the economy has slumped into a double-dip recession.】

item.title: 挪威工会达成工资协议避免大规模罢工
item.description: 挪威雇主和最大的私营部门工会在国家调解员的帮助下就工资问题达成协议，避免了一场大范围的罢工。【原文：Norway’s employers and the largest private-sector trade union clinched an agreement on wages with the help of the state mediator, averting a wide-ranging strike.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行谨慎的政策立场凸显了对粘性通胀的担忧
item.description: 距离澳大利亚上次加息已经过去了五个月，在此期间，通胀率有所放缓，经济发展也放慢了脚步。然而，储备银行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）坚持认为，她不能排除再次加息的可能性。【原文：It’s been five months since Australia last raised interest rates and in the interim inflation has moderated and the economy slowed to a crawl. Yet Reserve Bank Governor Michele Bullock insists she can’t rule out another hike.】

item.title: 黄金市场寻找金银突然暴涨背后的答案
item.description: 从远处看，黄金飙升至历史新高似乎很容易解释，因为地缘政治气候动荡，全球经济前景不明。贵金属被视为著名的 "避风港"，人们普遍认为，当利率下降时，金银价格就会上涨，而许多投资者预计今年晚些时候利率就会下降。【原文：Gold’s scorching run to an all-time high may seem easy to explain from a distance, given the fractious geopolitical climate and murky outlook for the global economy. The precious metal is famously seen as a “safe haven,” and the general view is that bullion prices should rise when interest rates fall — which many investors expect will happen later this year.】
